description: Modern Cinderella is a dating simulation game developed and published by NTT Solmare. The game was released on Apple and Android devices worldwide on 18 April 2017.

name: Shall we date?: We the Girls
description: Now available in the "My Shelf: My Choice, My Episode" app.

name: Niflheim Academy
description: Included in the "Story Jar" app.

name: Shall we date?: Love, Mafia Dawn of the Don
description: Otome game included in the "Story Jar" app.

name: Shall we date?: Love, Mafia My Signore
description: Story Jar's first BL title.

name: Shall we date?: Null;
description: Included in the "Story Jar" app.

name: The Last Sacrifice: Blood King's Desire
description: The first in The Last Sacrifice series.

name: The Last Sacrifice: Blood King's Treasure
description: Included in the "Story Jar" app.

name: The Last Sacrifice: Blood King's Beloved
description: Included in the "Story Jar" app.

name: The Last Sacrifice: A King's Past
description:
The Last Sacrifice: A King's Past is a spin-off story from The Last Sacrifice series.
It has two different endings, a romantic and a normal ending.

name: The Last Sacrifice: Forbidden Ties
description: Included in the "Story Jar" app.

name: Shall we date?: The World or You
description:
Included in the "Story Jar" app.
Fantasy story The World or You was released on 15 March 2020 and has a total of 12 chapters.

name: Shall we date?: Rewind
description: Rewind is a fantasy and mystery story under Shall We Date's Story Jar app.

name: Shall we date?: Pretty Awesome
description: Included in the "Story Jar" app.

name: Shall we date?: Become Elite
description:
Included in the "Story Jar" app.

Your rich uncle has suddenly passed away! You're going to inherit a share of his will, including the famous Water Lily estate. Together with three obnoxious butlers, you will spend the next three weeks training to come out into society at a formal debut.

name: Shall we date?: Mononoke Kiss x Lost Island
description:
Included in the "Story Jar" app.
Mononoke Kiss and Lost Island crossover.

name: Planisphere
description:
Planisphere is a relaxing sandbox puzzle game about discovering and creating constellations.

Place stars and connect them to discover the stories of constellations or build your own.

name: Conquer Humanity
description: Become the super villain in this brutal, isometric, fast paced bullet hell by a solo developer. Master your unlimited powers in combat, dismember civilians, cause mass destruction, defeat armed enemies and unique bosses. Be ready to Conquer Humanity!

name: One Piece: Pirate Warriors 2 - Collector's Editon
description:
One Piece: Pirate Warriors 2 is the breathtaking sequel of One Piece: Pirate Warriors, a big action/adventure game in which you will take down hordes of Pirates in the beloved world of One Piece. Immerse yourself by playing the “New World”, with your favorite’s characters and their latest techniques and costumes!

The collector's version contains a Luffy figurine made by the renowned Japanese sculptor Keiji Iwakura

name: Raziel Dungeon Arena
description: Sin descripción

name: Pixel Cat's End
description: Pixel Cat's End is a virtual pet site where you collect and manage a village of cat-like creatures. You can dress them up, give them jobs, build and decorate their homes, and take them on tabletop-rpg-style adventures.

name: The Ballz are Lava!
description: Nobody knows why - it's just always been this way. Our chance of survival is to absorb all the Green Orbs floating around, while avoiding certain death by touching the Lava - all before the time runs out!

name: Fluff Friends Rescue
description: Build and run your very own pet rescue! Help pets find loving homes! Clean, heal, and feed pets and choose from a never-ending selection of playpens, activities, and decorations.

name: Bunni: How We First Met
description: Find love and adventure on the magical Island of Bunni! Rebuild the island, plant trees and flowers, and collect a bustling village of adorable animals. Can you marry your true love?

name: Bombing!! 2: A Graffiti Paradise
description: Bombing!! 2: A Graffiti Paradise is a creative sandbox painting game where the entire game world can be painted, and a sequel to Bombing!!: A Graffiti Sandbox. In the game the player explores hidden secrets, talks to characters, and unlocks painting tools to paint all over the world. It features a bright and vibrant art style with bold colours and graphics.

name: Afghan Hero Girl
description: The story of a princess and a wizard who are always in a state of war and hostility. She must fight and defeat the wizard to rescue her family.

name: The Water is Wide
description:
You suddenly wake up in a little fishing boat, right in the middle of the Pacific Ocean. To make things worse, you have lost all your memories! How unfortunate...

However, it's not all that bad. You will now work along with your new friend Comi at her family business, the Mauri Oceanografic Team!

Explore the seven seas, look for your lost memories, meet new friends, be a little bit rude, and much more!

name: FeralHeart Unleashed
description: FeralHeart Unleashed is a free-to-play roleplaying MMO game where you can explore a vast online universe as several types of animal species! Express your endless creativity with creating your own stories and worlds, make new friends in a welcoming community, and show off your true colors!

name: Wild Thornberrys Australian Wildlife Rescue
description: Sin descripción

name: LockDown
description: Get through the day before the lockdown. Use spacial skills and math skills.

name: Chicken Smoothie
description: Collect new pets every month, watch them grow, dress them up and trade them with friends! Create artwork using the free online Oekaki app, and join clubs, roleplays, and discussions in the Forum!

name: Poker Now
description: Poker Now is free no download poker app. Just share the room link to play online private poker with your friends with play chips. Once you accept them, you are ready to play!

name: Elder Kings II
description: Total conversion mod to Crusader Kings 3 that transforms medieval Afro-Eurasia into the Elder Scrolls' Tamriel. A followup to the Elder Kings mod of Crusader Kings 2 which adapts Crusader Kings 3's engine and granular religion/culture mechanics to represent well known and obscure groups struggling for safety or supremacy in the Tamriel of the 2nd Era.

name: Pokémon Topaz
description: Pokemon Topaz is a Ruby-based ROM hack created by Bazza. In the game, the character embarks on a journey through the Topaz region as a newly promoted Team Rocket executive.

name: Wanderlost
description: Wanderlost is a narrative-driven horror puzzle game inspired by classic RPG Maker titles such as The Witch's House, Ib, and Mad Father.

name: Operation K.A.T.B.
description: On an unknown planet somewhere in the universe, one brave Social Justice Space Pirate must find and rescue their fearless crew the only way they know how...

name: Atop the Witch's Tower
description: A ZZT game about opening up.

name: OviPets
description:
A virtual pet game focused on genetics and breeding!

In the world of OviPets, you and your friends are able to raise and care for pets in all the colors of the rainbow. You can research new species and splice eggs with new mutations. Pets can pass on their mutations (along with their colors and other genetic traits) to their offspring. What will you research?

name: Tiredspace
description: Tiredspace is a game made in RPG Maker VX Ace that follows the story of Cola, a girl from Earth who deals with agoraphobia, her therapy robot Bocks, and Mocha, a girl from The Moon whose job is to replace the stars in the sky.

name: Saturn's Rising Temperature
description:
Follow the life of Saturn, a warehouse worker living on the man-made planet of SD-1409-V2, in a universe where space travel is a fad that has long since came and went.
Recently, she's been having strange dreams about the moon that orbits this planet... But, it's probably nothing, right?

name: Trying
description: Trying is a game about feeling. You play as... You. Trying to find the girl who cursed you 5 years ago, and took away your ability to be happy. Along the way you help some people, and make some friends. Made with rpg maker 2003!

name: Fields of Logic
description: Complete all levels by using purely some logic. Get your brain into shape and start using your logical skills!

name: Seen on Screen
description: Complete all levels by analyzing what you see on the monitor. Now touch that screen...

name: Blockman 1988
description:
Blockman 1988 is a retro-inspired twin-stick platformer-shooter that's a sequel to a Flash game from 2007, but it's really a prequel.

Join John Q. Blockman is on a quest to rescue hostages from and around the Valleyvale Shopping Mall. Use some of your cunning - no, all of your cunning - to thwart the evil, maybe-French, maybe-Canadian, maybe-Iranian terrorists cell's plot.

name: Nhero2
description: Sin descripción

name: Hakurei Frontier
description: Developed by Sitappa Games, who previously created "Alice's Cookie Story," this free-to-play game features characters and other elements from "Touhou Project," a bullet hell series originally developed by Shanghai Alice.

name: Niplob Adventure
description: This game pays tribute to the best jump and runs ever made whilst adding its own flaire.

name: What a Ball
description: What a Ball - A different kind of ball racing game. Follow Blue's adventure running against more than 600 Balls racing together. Be the Ball: Crash, jump, bounce and run up to 300 Km per hour. It's very challenging and hardcore game, if don't believe us, just try it.

name: Hakurei Frontier Spell Strive
description:
You can do it on your phone or on your computer!
Touhou characters play cards!

name: Kemono Labyrinth
description:
Secondary roguelike of the popular anime "Kemono Friends"!
It is a game that anyone can easily enjoy with various Kemono Friends unique systems.

name: Crypto Royale
description: Crypto Royale is a browser-based, free-to-play, play-to-earn crypto game in which players compete for fame, glory and a little profit. Last man standing wins crypto. No up-front investment. No downloads. No signups. Get into a game in 30 seconds and win! The game is purposefully designed to be simple to play yet difficult to master. Every day 1000+ players congregate on the battlefield as they fight to see who can survive and claim the game’s HRC-20 token – ROY.

name: Mine Seeker
description: Mine Seeker is a strategic game where the player has to click tiles in order to find mines hidden under some of them. It might seem familiar to many people... If you like to play calming games with peaceful atmosphere you should give it a try!

name: Pocohontos
description: Pocohontas is an unlicensed port of Pocahontas for the Game Boy by Ei-How Yang, made in 1997 for the Famicom and released by Hosenkan Electronics.

name: ForeVR Pool
description:
ForeVR Pool brings the coolest pool halls from around the globe straight to your living room! Challenge friends, family, and in-game pros to a game of 8-ball pool – no table required.

Battle 12 bots to level up and take on Legendary challengers. Join a Quick Match or jump into a private multiplayer party! Friend in town? Share your headset with Pass & Play. Up the ante and stake in-game coins in matches against other players.

name: Fantasy Life: Origin Island
description:
The Origin Island Expansion Pack includes the following new content:
- A new island to explore and new quests
- Additional elements for avatar customization
- Recustomization of avatar
- New ranks and new crafts
- Additional pets
- New holiday homes
- New decor and other additional items

name: Super Spatial
description: Super Spatial lets you create and explore millions of player created experiences with friends and players around the world.

name: Will There Bee Another?
description: You are Bee, a girl that it's on an online date with Mel. The date is almost over, but Bee doesn't wanna end it... Can you find the correct words to delay this date a little more, or even get a second date?

name: The Potion Shop
description: You are Ryo, a guy that has a potion shop with his boyfriend, Aimer. Ryo is a great alchemist so he has to create some potions, but he is really anxious. Can you help him do those potions?

name: Grayscale
description: Follow the story of Samael, a young man who awakens in the unfamiliar world of Libra, several years after an apocalyptic event. He is soon taken in by a settlement of survivors hoping to survive and thrive in this new, dangerous world they now call home. Join the survivors as they learn to believe in their future, despite the destruction they have witnessed.

name: Ridge Racer
description: Ridge Racer is a port of the 1993 racing game made for mobile devices and the Zeebo.

name: Those Infernal Girls!
description: After a strange light is seen in the deserts outside the town of Offal newbie herders Agatha and her girlfriend Margot embark on their first solo herding assignment to round up the infernals attracted by the light, but strange characters and even stranger creatures await them.

name: RadiAngel
description: Waking up from stasis alone with no memories years ago Em has made peace with living a calm quiet life in her bunker, until one day while watching the cameras she spots a woman who needs help. Letting her into her life and bunker Em changes both of their lives forever...

name: Checkers Online
description:
Play Checkers online for free!
Choose your level and favourite rules: American Checkers or International Draughts

name: Hyacinth
description: Hyacinth is a psychological horror game that centers on Neo(they/them) after they find themselves alone on a strange train. Follow them as they navigate through surreal train car after surreal train car... and try to find their way home.

name: Steelrising: Cagliostro's Secrets
description: Uncover the darkest secrets of the King's agent, the Comte de Cagliostro, and seek out the revolutionary Jacques Pierre Brissot.

name: Tree World
description: Grow your tree to the sky and make it a home for adorable critters!

name: Dancing Stage MegaMix
description:
Dancing Stage MegaMix is the fifth home release in the Dancing Stage series, a European version of the Dance Dance Revolution series of music video games. MegaMix was the first Dancing Stage game released on the Sony PlayStation 2 game console.

Based largely on Dancing Stage EuroMix 2, MegaMiX was separated from the arcade game by a completely different track list of songs. The game was marketed by Konami as a family game and an exercise tool in an effort to make the niche series more mainstream.

name: ZTetris
description:
ZTetris is the classic TI calculator clone of the popular Tetris game that everybody has played, and that has been made for all kinds of gaming platforms. The original game was programmed in assembly by Jimmy Mardell for the TI-85 and executed via ZShell, but the game has since been ported to every TI graphing calculator by other members of the community.

The game has an impressive list of features, including two-player linkplay (which even works between every TI graphing calculator), 21 levels, top 3 high scores saved with names, 16 different alternating background patterns, trash lines, and even a teacher key.

name: Asmodeus's Hell: Devil in the Sunshine State
description: A horror, mystery visual novel where you choose your own story.

name: Blockchain Brawlers
description: Welcome to the Brawlerverse. Blockchain Brawlers is a PvP Web3 fighting game designed by Magic: The Gathering mastermind Richard Garfield and developed by Tyranno Studios. In this battle of strategy and suplexes, legions of glory-eyed grapplers go at it to prove who is Brawl mighty

name: The Jumping Quesadilla: Turbo
description: Join BIG Q on his exciting journey through the kitchen and make him jump! Enjoy the colorful comic graphics accompanied by atmospheric music.

name: The Jumping Quesadilla
description: Join BIG Q on his exciting journey through the kitchen and make him jump! Enjoy the colorful comic graphics accompanied by atmospheric music.

name: Speed Track Racing
description: Sin descripción

name: Furry Tangram Lite
description: In Furry Tangram Lite, you’ll solve tangram puzzles while enjoying beautiful art. To clear a level you need to place all the available pieces on the given pattern. But they can't overlap! Explore a 3D hallway, and build your gallery with images from the tangram puzzles. Experience the timeless joy of 65 different tangram puzzles.

name: In Extremis DX
description: In Extremis DX is a challenging and provocative shoot'em up about finding yourself in the chaos of the universe.

name: Puzzle Collection: Complete Edition
description: If you love jigsaw puzzles, this is the right place to solve a dozen of amazing puzzles! Puzzle Collection: Complete Edition is 66 beautiful puzzles you can solve on the go! Don’t miss this perfect collection of puzzles!

name: The Wishing Flower
description: In The Wishing Flower you play as Thomas, a bunny boy who wants to collect moonflowers. Moonflowers are said to call the Star Prince who can grant you anything you desire.

name: KawaiiDungeon: Rise of a Goddess
description: Learn Japanese for free with KawaiiDungeon! KawaiiDungeon will help you to learn Japanese faster while reading and remembering hiragana, katakana and vocabulary in a fun and interactive way!

name: Seaglass
description:
The player controls Eliot, a young adult who has never met their closest friend, Loren, in person before. The two have conversed exclusively through messages in bottles tossed back and forth at sea. After seven years, Loren is coming to visit Eliot, and they want to commemorate the occasion with a special and suitable gift.

They decide on a seaglass necklace, and it's up to the player to obtain it!

name: Dungeon Squad
description: A seemingly infinite stream of heroes invaded the dungeon and brought ruin to the Abyss. Now you must go straight to the source of the enemy and return your home to its former glory. Defeat the Army of Light and take back the power of the Abyss.

name: Away in the Woods
description: Away in the Woods is an upcoming RPG Maker XP game about a woman who lives alone in the woods. Spend three days, each a quarter century apart, in her shoes, learning the woods and shaping her reputation in the nearby town. What will she be known as?

name: Inn Need
description:
There was once a marvelous hotel in the town of Queen's Horizon. Each room had a different theme, every stay was an adventure. But as the Silver Willow Inn passed from owner to owner, it fell into disrepair more and more.

The new owner, Hestia Kindlee, is determined to rejuvenate the inn that she remembers from her childhood! And no leaky pipes, cobwebby cellars, or haunted hotel rooms are going to stop her! Explore the old inn, fix what you can, find help for what you can't, and restore the inn to its former glory.

name: Football Life 2023
description: Football Life 2023 game is an attempt to continue the offline modes of the retired PES series, football life is a standalone football game based on pes21, built for offline career modes only. SP Football Life is how we like to play a football game.

name: Potty Quest
description: You play as an enby mage kid in search of a bathroom in the spooky basement of a community college while making friends with the local monsters and collecting magic rocks along the way.

name: The Lost Girl
description:
The walls have been gouged open. Strange noises come from below. Apparitions bar your progress. Death has visited here.

This is the building where your girlfriend went missing. If you want to find her and save your relationship, you have only one option.

name: Raiden III x Mikado Maniax
description: This is an enhanced version of the original Raiden III, which came out in 2005 for arcades and consoles. There will be some new game modes, online features, and customization options.

name: VVVV
description:
Disaster! While traveling to the beach planet of Relaxia, you and all your crew members suddenly got teleported to a dangerous but strangely familiar place.

Rescue the six stranded crewmen so you can finally bask in both glory and sunlight on Relaxia.

VVVV is a 4K tribute to Terry Cavanagh's brilliant game VVVVVV.

name: Seed of Life
description: Seed of Life is a relaxing puzzle game in which you create beautiful and enlightening spirographic patterns.

name: Seed of Life
description: Seed of Life is an old school action-adventure game. You play as Hope, a wolf spirit on a quest to restore natural order. In your journey, you'll be accompanied by a bird named Letty. Use both their unique skills to explore exotic places, fight formidable foes, and discover hidden secrets.

name: Wo Long: Fallen Dynasty - Steelbook Launch Edition
description:
Wo Long: Fallen Dynasty is a historical fantasy action role-playing video game developed by Team Ninja and published by Koei Tecmo.

Set during a fictionalised version of the fall of the Han Dynasty, the plot follows an unnamed protagonist who battles historical characters and Chinese mythological creatures corrupted by demonic qi.

The Steelbook Launch Edition includes:
- Wo Long: Fallen Dynasty game
- Exclusive Steelbook collectable case
- Bonus DLC items “Crown of Zhurong” and “Crown of Gonggong”

name: The Dark Pictures Anthology: Season One
description: Season One (2019 - 2022) is the first season of The Dark Pictures Anthology. This season includes the first four installments of the anthology.

name: R-Type Tactics I & II Cosmos
description:
Outsmart and outgun your opponent in R-Type Tactics I • II Cosmos, the ultimate turn-based sci-fi strategy collection!

This two-game combination of the classic R-Type Tactics titles arrives on modern consoles for the first time, equipped with an armada of unique units to deploy across dozens of levels.

Multiple campaigns allow you to take on the Bydo Empire or even play as them yourself, while competitive online play lets you square off against others.

name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails into Reverie - Deluxe Edition
description: The Deluxe Edition includes the Base Game, Digital Soundtrack and Mini Art Book.

name: R-Type Final 3 Evolved
description:
R-Type Final 3 Evolved serves simultaneously as a sequel to R-Type Final 2, offering a whole new 7-stage campaign made in the engine of Final 2, whilst also serving as a compilation of most of content released for R-Type Final 2.

Additional features such as R-Park, an online area where one can interact with other players.

name: R-Type Final 3 Evolved: Special Edition
description: Special Edition includes R-Type Final 3 Evolved Limited Edition, "Starfighter" 2-disc Soundtrack and a R-9A Arrowhead Keychain Light

name: R-Type Final 3 Evolved: Deluxe Edition
description: Deluxe Edition includes R-Type Final 3 Evolved game, “Discovery” 1-disc Soundtrack, Softcover Art book.

name: Rainbow Impostor Survivor 3D
description: In Rainbow Impostor Survivor 3D, you will play as an impostor who has been kidnapped during a school trip to an amusement park called Spooky park. From the moment of your capture, the impostor must survive five nights in the strange location that’s entirely empty of life except for you and the Rainbow Monster.

name: Ninja JaJaMaru: The Great Yokai Battle + Hell - Deluxe Edition
description: Ninja JaJaMaru: The Great Yokai Battle +Hell – Deluxe Edition includes six of the most important platformer evergreens in the iconic JaJaMaru series. Besides the brand new 2022 released Ninja JaJaMaru: The Great Yokai Battle +Hell, true ninja fans can look forward to awesome, classic Jump & Run action and also a very special addition to this collection – Ninja JaJaMaru: The Great World Adventure, an original GB game can now be experienced in color for the first time! We painstakingly hand-coloured this “black & white” classic and made it run perfectly on modern consoles – for this Deluxe Edition!

name: Answer These 10 Questions And I'll Tell You What Kind of Lover You Are
description: A choose-your-own-adventure heartbreak in the shape of a quiz. A short story that's sort of like if a prose poem and a buzzfeed quiz had a baby and they all fucking hated you.

name: Pop'n Music UniLab
description: The 27th main installment of the Pop'n Music series, featuring a research laboratory theme.

name: Holiday Hex
description: Holiday Hex is a fun little hack where you play as Tina and Kyle, two kids who find themselves trapped in a time loop similar to that movie “Groundhog Day” , Christmas Eve is repeating itself over and over, and at this rate the kids will never get their presents! Now, it’s up to Tina and Kyle to save Christmas.

name: EightBound Regal
description:
EightBound Regal is an ‘remaster’ of the original Final Fantasy / EarthBound crossover hack by Poliynm and Mareeta. Regal was created in response to complaints about the game being ‘too difficult’.

EightBound was a hack that brought Final Fantasy characters, abilities, conventions, and challenges to the world of EarthBound.

name: Post-Shift 2
description: Post-Shift 2 is a Five Nights at Freddy's fangame project set in an alternate universe from the original FNAF games by Scott Cawthon. Acting as a continuation of the previous fangame, Post-Shift.

name: Chop Goblins
description: Pursue the malevolent Chop Goblins through time, and foil them with devastating weapons, in this bite-sized FPS from the creator of Dusk, Iron Lung, and Squirrel Stapler

name: Remembrance
description:
Remembrance is the story of a woman named Kim who wakes up in a bizarre place with only hazy memories of her past and how she got there. Together with a strange, magic-wielding entity named Jesse, she sets out in search of what she's lost, as well as to complete the mission assigned to her that, in Jesse's words, is of the utmost importance.

As she recovers and reflects on the memories of her life, however, Kim quickly realizes that some of the more powerful feelings and impressions in her mind, despite their nostalgic familiarity, don't match up with any of her memories...

name: Hibernaculum
description:
A survival horror RPG by Wormwood Studios

Old School Dungeon Crawl/Survival Horror experience meets speculative fiction inspired modern take on the genre.

name: Permanence
description:
Rook is lost.

He was trying to fulfill a debt of gratitude. Indeed, he was compelled, duty-bound by his very nature to fulfill it. The situation, however, got out of hand, forcing him to abandon his friend lest he be destroyed.

Of course, this was intolerable. He swore to her he would repay her kindness! He SWORE it! To leave her to struggle alone in her time of need...! It wasn't long before he began seeking her out in earnest to make things right.

name: Thera 1
description: This entry of Thera follows the slapdash pilot broadcast of a TV program hosted by two remarkably stable and self-aware fragments named Hera and Despera.

name: Lift Your Spirits
description:
You are a desperate college student rushing to meet the deadline of your last assignment before semester break. With no choice but to stay late, you find yourself alone at campus in the dead of night.

You never believed the rumors spread around the student body. Ghost stories were simply stories, right?

...Right?

name: Melissa
description: A short retro tech horror visual novel, with a bit of comedy that taps into the general time period of the Apple II, and other examples of old computer tech.

name: Apple Pie
description: A sweet, cute friendship/dating sim with roleplaying elements.

name: Fate of the Damned
description: Fate of the Damned is a meticulously crafted custom campaign for BLOOD which aims to speculate and explore another shadowed path that Caleb might've undertaken. While taking care to never stray far from the gameplay formula that made BLOOD so gripping, the campaign will see Caleb journey through new environments that he has not seen before. Gruesome new discoveries await as he tears through hordes of the undead and nothing is left unscathed in his quest for vengeance.

name: Raguna and the Crystal of Miracles
description: Raguna and The Crystal of Miracles is a RPG Maker horror/comedy game featuring 2+ hours of content, several endings, and many ways to die.

name: Resident Evil 2: Kendo's Cut
description: From the creator of Mortal Night and director of the upcoming During the Storm, comes an increasingly maddenning and hilarious adventure for Resident Evil 2 that answers the following question: What would have happened if Robert Kendo had survived the gunshop attack and then followed Leon in his descent into darkness?

name: Bohemian Symphony
description: Follow the nonsensical adventures of Zalmora Greenhand and friends as they attempt to solve murders, fend off curses, and survive zombie apocalypses.

name: Aren't You Overcompensating for Something?
description:
I can't stop my mind from coming up with new ideas.

Constantly, be it during work or while trying to sleep, I have to stop what I'm doing and note down the new ideas that came to me out of nowhere.

Restless creativity. Never-ending tension for not creating more. The feeling of 'I could be writing right now' follows me at all times.

So why is it that I can't write?

name: My GF Doesn't Know What I'm Into
description: A visual novel about my cute new girlfriend, who doesn't know what i'm into!

name: Pocket GT
description: Sin descripción

platforms.name: Visual Memory Unit / Visual Memory System

name: VillageRhapsody
description: The player will play an aspiring young man who participates in the construction of a new rural area. He will use his life skills to help complete the requests of the villagers, meet the needs of the girls, improve the girls' goodwill towards you, and strive for the honor of a strong man who dares to carry water for the widow.

name: Rainbow Dawn
description: One day, you find yourself trapped in a dream state. You can't remember anything about yourself, where you came from, and why you've been asleep for so long. Once you wake up, you realize that the entire world has been cleansed of all human souls..! At least, so you are told by your fairy companion, Hope. You need to find other signs of human life if you wish to survive, if there are any left. However... people may have still had regrets before they passed, and it's up to you to fulfill them.. or not.

name: Toontown Rewritten: Sellbot Task Force
description: Sellbot Task Force expands Toontown with challenging Sellbot Field Offices and a substantial new taskline

name: Radiant Devotion
description: Radiant Devotion is a Fire Emblem: Path of Radiance fangame centered on Ike/Soren during the day of devotion festival.

name: Hangaroo
description: Play the classic Hangaroo game and figure out the words and phrases by guessing the letters! Try to guess the phrase without failing four times! Or else the friendly kangaroo will be hanged mercilessly!

name: Tale of Memories
description: As the descendent of the Hero of Tarwen, your duty to your kingdom is to find and defeat its greatest villain, released after centuries of imprisonment: the Carmine Witch. On your journey, as you befriend fellow knights and civilians alike, your mission grows in complexity as you encounter the enigmatic Masked Mage, the secrets of neighboring kingdoms, and rumors of other looming threats with ties to the Carmine Witch. In the realm of Dryadales, legends, myths, and fables often prove to be true—but not always in the ways you imagined!

name: Meat
description: You play as 'Seven,' an object head girl who opened her eyes in a storage at a restaurant. With the help of a pie object head girl named ‘Meatpie’ and a mysterious cat named Cheshire, can you get out of here?

name: Darling of the Sea
description: Darling of the Sea is a short romance thriller game about the protagonist, Ivy Blue, who wished on a shooting star on her lover's death anniversary; and her resurrected lover. There are slight horror elements and 4 endings in this game.

name: Your Voice in the Autumn Leaves
description: After his girlfriend Kaori broke up with him, 17 year old student Kure isolated himself from the world, spending his time home, heartbroken, listening to sad indie songs and playing videogames. Then, one day, outside the Hospital where his mother works, Kure met someone very special: a girl named Autumn, who has been diagnosed with cancer and is trying to assimilate her situation. That day would change their lives forever...

name: The Toy Factory Across the Street
description:
Francesca, a brilliant young transgender journalist, goes back to the house where she grew up to celebrate the birthday of her father. Unfortunately for Francesca, there's an abandoned toy factory across the street where many people have died or have been reported missing, and strange phenomena can be witnessed at night. She has always dreaded that place, and now what was supposed to be a nice celebration will turn out to be a night full of horrors beyond human comprehension...
The horrors of...The Toy Factory Across the Street...

name: Drom
description: Described by the developer: "A short, pointless game about a dream I once had."

name: Alloy Soldier Xenia
description: Alloy Soldier Xenia is an open world action adventure platformer where you control a battle android in search of her memories and her purpose.

name: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell: Extended Ops
description: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell: Extended Ops is a mobile game for early 2000s phones developed by Gameloft and released in 2003. The story is strange when compared to other Tom Clancy endorsed media, as corrupt members of the Russian Kremlin are intent on causing earthquakes with a new form of Weapon of Mass Destruction. Unlike other titles in the series, the events seem to only take place in one location rather than multiple sites from around the globe. This is likely due to storage limits, as it was a mobile phone game for flip-phones and brick-phones.

name: Dream Team
description:
Do you ever hear different voices in your head when you're half-asleep?

Help Triangle, Circle and Square navigate through your dreams. Where will they go? What will they become? Will it be a pleasant dream or a dreadful one?

name: Bloody Roar Extreme
description: Bloody Roar Extreme is the Xbox version of Bloody Roar Primal Fury first released on the Nintendo GameCube. This version includes a new character, CGI cutscenes and hidden game modes.

name: QuadraPop
description: A simple and straightforward puzzle java game developed for mobile devices with multiple sequels, one of them called QuadraPop Robotic.

name: Let's Sing 2023: Platinum Edition
description: Grab your microphone for the best singing game experience with Let's Sing 2023 Platinum Edition! This includes a copy of the Let's Sing 2023 game and the Let's Sing 2023 Song Pass which allows you to sing all of the DLC Content!

name: Ginormo Sword
description: An idle parody flash RPG where you grind for gold to increase the size of your sword to giant proportions and destroy all the enemies on this silly adventure.

name: House Builder & Ultimate Fishing Simulator
description:
House Builder
Become a one-man construction crew! Travel around the world and through the ages to build iconic designs! Beware unpleasant temperatures and dangerous fauna!

Ultimate Fishing Simulator
Bored of waiting for a bite? Would you like to catch some fish? You're lucky - in Ultimate Fishing Simulator, fish bite like crazy! Spinning, float fishing, ground fishing and more!

name: Mavis Beacon Teaches Typing Version 15
description: With Mavis Beacon Teaches Typing 15, you'll perform better whenever you're sitting in front of a keyboard! Track your accomplishments and stay motivated with tests, progress reports, and special certificates. Develop the essential typing skills you need for school and career success, with a little help from Mavis Beacon!

name: Tori no Hoshi: Aerial Planet
description: Sin descripción

name: Puzzle: Bokura no 48 Jikan Sensou
description: Sin descripción

name: The Undertaking
description: Sin descripción

name: Foodfight!
description:
Foodfight! is a cancelled tie-in game for the movie of the same name that was in development in 2006 for the Nintendo GameCube, Game Boy Advance and PlayStation 2. The game was shown off at E3 2006, however despite that, it's what the game was meant to be about due to the lack of gameplay footage, but is assumed to be a 3D platformer.

The game was cancelled after the movie was delayed until 2012.

name: One Direction Heardle
description: A clone of Heardle, but for One Direction (group) songs. Each 1D Heardle is a randomly chosen song.

name: Gashi Shachi no Sachi
description:
This game is browsing the internet for pages that don't exist, starting with the mysterious homepage "GashiShachiNoSachi".

When you start the game, you will see a screen that looks like an operating system with sound effects. First, try logging in and launching your browser.
Browsers come with back, forward, refresh, and home buttons that are useful for browsing.
You can jump directly to a page by entering the URL in the address field and clicking the Go button.

On some pages, objects can be got by clicking on them.
The object you get will be displayed in the eyedropper field of the browser.
The object can be attached to a some object, and if the content of the attachment is correct, an event will occur.
When the event occurs, you can go to another link.

Enjoy surfing the net.

name: Ookeenga
description:
The gameplay of Ookeenga is a combination of 3 genres that are common in the gaming community: Real-time Strategy, Collectible Card, and Tower Defense.
Players will be placed with troops/active skills to attack the opponent on a battlefield.
The match ends when: The player destroys the opponent's main house.
Within 3 minutes, the match will automatically terminate the game and calculate the score based on the % remaining health of the Main-tower and Sub-towers. Whoever destroys the opponent's Main Tower shall immediately win the game. If time's up and the Main Tower still remains, which side destroys more towers will become the winner.

name: Cyball
description:
Cyball CyBall is a futuristic football-themed (US: soccer), NFT-based game where users can collect and form a team of CyBlocs and face off against other teams online, or trade and mentor new CyBlocs within the CyBall's ecosystem. Initially, the game will launch on BNB Chain with immediate plans to launch on Solana as soon as it is ready to create a multi-chain gaming environment.
The CyBall game engine combines different elements of strategy, simulation and chance into the form of an exciting and competitive turn-based football card game, where players compete to see who can score the most goals. Players train up their CyBlocs to compete in various game modes with varying levels of rewards. Existing CyBlocs can also mentor young CyBlocs, creating the next generation of unique NFTs. In future expansions, we aim to give players more ways to spend accrued rewards, both in CyBall and in the wider CyBloc universe.

name: Alpine Racer
description: Alpine Racer is a downhill racing game developed by Namco Bandai Games for mobile devices, it has three mountains to run down avoiding obstacles, each one of a different difficulty, in two gameplay modes: Story Mode or Time Attack.

name: Titan Hunters
description: Titan Hunters is inspired by fun gameplay of Diablo, Voxel’s signature look and the feel of Minecraft. It is a creative and unique game project that combines NFT (Earning Nature) and the best gaming genre of MMORPG (Fun Nature).

name: Sonic Robo Blast 2: Whisper the Wolf
description:
A character addon for Sonic Robo Blast 2.

Whisper the Wolf, sneaking in from the Sonic IDW comics, with her Variable Wispon in tow makes it to SRB2!

Whisper is a very versatile character, with many tools for a variety of situations, perfecting each of her tool allows you to traverse maps with relative ease!

name: Adventure Academia: The Fractured Continent - New Adventure Volume 3: Linking Light's Successor 1-3
description: Description: A new adventure in the Shadowlands, featuring three brand new quests! Euclase and Lapis take center stage as main characters! What is the truth behind the new threat that looms over the entire continent?!

name: Adventure Academia: The Fractured Continent - Vol.3 Bonus Unit: Euclase
description: Description: Adds Euclase, a main character from the storyline, into the game as a playable character.

name: Adventure Academia: The Fractured Continent - Vol.3 Bonus Unit: Lapis
description: Description: Adds Lapis, a main character from the storyline, into the game as a playable character.

name: Adventure Academia: The Fractured Continent - Vol.3 Challenge Quest: Linking Light's Successor EX
description: Description: Adds a bonus challenge quest featuring an enhanced version of the boss encounter from Linking Light's Successor. This quest does not include any story content.

name: Battle for the Galaxy: Ice Bastion Pack
description: This DLC includes additional content which will become available in-game after purchase and make your space outpost a lot stronger!

name: Battle of Empires : 1914-1918 - Victory Pack
description: This free DLC includes the "Battle for Berlin" multiplayer mission.

name: Battlerite Royale: Legendary Adventure Pack
description: There’s an entire world to see - you need the right gear for the journey! The Legendary Adventure Pack contains everything you need for your travels - six Legendary Outfits, three Royale Chests, and the exclusive Baby Storm Wyvern Mount to fly around the Battlerite world upon.

name: Battlerite Royale: Legendary Adventure Pack Vol.2
description: The Legendary Adventure Pack Volume 2 contains another pack of gear you'll want to take to Talon Island, with a new Mount to carry you into the fight!

name: Battlestar Galactica Deadlock: Modern Ships Pack
description: From the behemoth Mercury class battlestar, to the iconic Modern Basestar, this ship pack contains six ships of the modern era of Battlestar Galactica.

name: Chrono's Arena: Characters Pack
description: Bored with the same four characters? Don't want to play hours to acquire all the characters? This pack is for you. This Character Pack includes 10 characters that will bring you 80 more skills to enter the Arena!

name: Children's Jigsaw Puzzles: Beautifully Illustrated - Expansion Pack
description: This puzzle game helps your kids develop matching and fine motor skills. Your children will just love these wonderfully hand-drawn pictures and will improve their spatial skills while having fun!

name: Phantasy Star Online 2: Vivienne Pack
description: Get in-game items exclusive to Phantasy Star Online 2 through this pack. A special pack containing a 200 SG Ticket and collaboration items from Phantasy Star Universe, for one-time purchase only. Purchase this pack to obtain an outfit that will let you become Vivienne from the Phantasy Star Universe series.

name: Phantasy Star Online 2: Howzer Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Sands of Slumber: The RPG
description: A 2D Old-school RPG based on the Dungeons and Dragons Custom World Campaign of the same name. Players play as the 4 main heroes of the story as they adventure around Tanaviak, leveling up, gaining new skills and exploring the land.

name: World of Warships: Admiral Graf Spee Pack
description: Take home the famed German 'pocket battleship' Graf Spee, a skilled Commander for her helm, and a sprinkling of Doubloons!

name: Phantasy Star Online 2: Helga Pack
description: A special pack containing a 200 SG Ticket and collaboration items from Phantasy Star Universe, for one-time purchase only. Purchase this pack to obtain an outfit that will let you become Helga Neumann from the Phantasy Star Universe series.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Eternal Crusade - Belial War Pack
description: Will you hear his call and be a loyal servant of the Emperor? If you do, then why not stand out in the middle of melee with the Belial War Pack? It includes the Champion weapon and armour pack (for the Space Marine faction) and 10,000 RTCs to customize your warrior furthermore.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine - Traitor Legions Pack
description: The emperor's children Legion betrayed their figurative father -- the Emperor of Man -- some ten thousand years ago, during the Horus Heresy. The Legion fell to the perverse temptations of the Chaos God Slaanesh, becoming addicted to the sensations of battle and conquest. They have served the Prince of Excess ever since.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine - Death Guard Champion Chapter Pack DLC
description: Corrupted and swollen by the pestilences and plagues that afflict them Death Guard Champions prefer short ranged combat where they can spread the diseases that the Chaos God Nurgle has blessed them with. Immune to pain or damage they grimly advance forward laughing off attacks and leaving a trail of pestilence and disease behind them.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine - Iron Hands Chapter Pack
description: Driven by their hatred of weakness in all forms including their own genetically enhanced flesh, the Iron Hands are known for the extensive cybernetic and mechanical augmentations that they undergo. Veteran battle brothers of the Iron Hands are almost entirely mechanical with the majority of their flesh replaced.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine - Emperor’s Elite Pack
description: Renowned crusaders against the enemies of humanity, the BLACK TEMPLARS eschew the idea of a home world. Instead, they have taken to the stars in mighty crusade fleets, actively seeking out the enemy throughout the Galaxy.

name: Wakfu: Ouginak Pack
description: The Ouginak Pack includes 30 days of God Booster, the Tracker Costume, the Ouginak Haven Bag Kit and an Exceptional Artipotion.

name: Blockpost Mobile
description: Blockpost Mobile is a new tactical shooter from the cubic game universe by Skullcap Studios. Keeping the hurricane character of the classic online FPS, the game sets a new level of gameplay, at the junction of the most popular and relevant genres.

name: Petadachi
description:
Raise adorable pets in Petadachi. ​Explore with your pet. Play with your pet. Care for your pet. Love your pet.
Learn your pet's unique likes and dislikes. Go fishing with your pet. Shop for items. Search for items in tall grass.
There's so much to discover in Petadachi.

name: Pocket Pool
description:
It's time for crazy Pool. Sit back and enjoy 50 unique tables.
Fancy multiplayer with your friends? We have it - up to 4 players on one console!
The plan is simple: aim a cue ball, hit other balls and put them in a pocket. Here's the tricky part: the pool is a banana! Or a watermelon, or a castle, a pirate ship... you name it, we got it.

Enjoy this bonkers game, alone or with your frienemies.

name: NeverSynth
description: NeverSynth is a 3rd person game that is a rhythm driving simulator. This game is a dynamic action game in which you have to drive a car to rhythmic music and collect beats. The more beats you collect, the more game points you earn.

name: MopGarden's Veggie Cart
description:
MopGarden’s Veggie Cart is a fast-paced, simulation game where you feed hungry bunnies lots of healthy vegetables! Can you feed them all in time?

MopGarden, a variety Twitch streamer, has decided to feed all the local bunnies in her town. As business begins to boom, she moves her veggie cart to other surrounding areas, where the vegetable orders get faster, and faster, and faster.

name: KnifeBoy: Rebooted
description: Things are going to start getting weird.

name: Floating Cloud God: Anniversary Edition
description: How many Pilgrims can you save? A vibrant, colourful and inventive 2D shoot-em-up where you can't be defeated, as long as you are loved!

name: Elysion 2: Genes of the saints
description: Sin descripción

name: Dead Station
description: Dead Station is an old school platforming experience set on the space station Soyuz-1 overrun by some hostile monsters. Your task is to arm yourself with melee weapons and firearms, find any answers on what the hell happened there and survive no matter what!

name: Labyrinth: Classic Pinball Puzzle
description: A classic pinball puzzle game in which you have to roll the ball to the end of the maze!

name: Money Parasite: Usotsuki na Onna
description: An otome game by Takuyo.

name: Cleopatra Fortune: S-Tribute
description: Surround falling stones and treasures to fill up and wipe out lines! Score points with "all clears" and "chains." Cleopatra Fortune, a puzzle game set in Egypt, has been revived with new modes that make it easier to play. Two players can face off in versus mode.

name: The King of Fighters Arena
description:
Enjoy the action of KOF anywhere, anytime!
Enter KOF Arena and become the strongest fighter in the world in the newest installment of the greatest fighting game series, The King of Fighters!
